trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Számoknak <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektumokat a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály nem örökölhető.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBindingCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A TreeNodeBindingCollection osztály használható tárolására és kezelésére gyűjteménye <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektumokat a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>vezérlő.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control uses the TreeNodeBindingCollection class for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>használ a TreeNodeBindingCollection osztály a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>tulajdonsága tartalmazza <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektumok, amelyek meghatározzák egy adatelemet, ezért van a csomópont közötti kapcsolat.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy adatforrást, ha minden adatelemet tartalmaz (például egy XML-elem több attribútumokkal rendelkező), több tulajdonság kötése egy csomópont jeleníti meg a által visszaadott érték a `ToString` metódus az elem, alapértelmezés szerint.

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Egy XML-elem esetén a csomópont jeleníti meg az elem nevét, a fa alapvető szerkezetét mutatja, de nem nagyon hasznos ellenkező esetben.

trans-unit.source: You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: A csomópont kell egy adott adatok elemtulajdonság fa csomópont kötések megadásával kötni.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively.
trans-unit.target: Bár a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>gyűjtemény programból feltölthetők, általában be deklarációval.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the tree node bindings declaratively: 1.
trans-unit.target: A fa csomópont kötéseinek beállítása deklarációval: 1.

trans-unit.source: Nest opening and closing `<DataBindings>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Megnyitása és bezárása beágyazásához `<DataBindings>` címkék a nyitó és a záró címkék között a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>vezérlő.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Place `<asp:TreeNodeBinding>` elements between the opening and closing `<DataBindings>` tags for each tree node binding that you want to specify.
trans-unit.target: Hely `<asp:TreeNodeBinding>` elemei között a nyitó és záró `<DataBindings>` , amelyet meg szeretne fa csomópont kötésben címkék.

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage a TreeNodeBindingCollection by adding and removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: Programozott módon kezelheti a TreeNodeBindingCollection hozzáadása és eltávolítása <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektumok.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hozzáadása egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>gyűjtésére, felhasználására objektumot a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A>vagy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: To remove nodes from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Csomópontok eltávolítása a gyűjteményből, használja a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, vagy <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBindingCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A> indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object directly at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: A TreeNodeBindingCollection az osztály támogatja a gyűjtemény elemeinek eléréséhez többféleképpen:-használatát a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A>megszerezni az indexelő egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektum közvetlenül egy adott nulla alapú indexét.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: – Használja a <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metódus létrehozása, amely segítségével a gyűjtemény iterációt számbevevőre.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A megadott hozzáfűzi <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektum végének a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Az Add metódus használatával hozzáfűzése a megadott <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum végének a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>objektum.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> at a specific index using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Alternatív megoldásként is beszúrhat egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>egy adott index az a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to append.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> hozzáfűzendő.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the location of the added <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A hozzáadott helyét nulla alapú indexét <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> a a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy a megadott <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektum már szerepel a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: A Contains módszer segítségével meghatározhatja, hogy egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum tartalmazza a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>objektum.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert gyakran használatos meglétét tesztelése egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum a feladatok, például a hozzáadása vagy eltávolítása előtt egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>a gyűjteményből.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> található.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> szerepel a gyűjteményben; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Másolja át az összes elemet a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> egy kompatibilis egydimenziós tömb objektum <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektumok, a cél tömb a megadott indextől kezdődő.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object into `bindingArray`.
trans-unit.target: A CopyTo metódus használatával a tartalom másolása a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>az objektum `bindingArray`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Másolja a program kezdődő `index`.

trans-unit.source: You can then use the array to access the items that are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjteményben lévő elemek eléréséhez használhatja a tömb.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Alternatív megoldásként használhatja a <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>létrehozása a számbavevő a gyűjtemény elemeinek elérésére használt módszer.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú tömbje <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> , amely megkapja a másolt elemeket az objektumok a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position in `bindingArray` at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: A pozíció `bindingArray` indításának a másolt tartalom fogadására.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy a megadott indexét <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektum a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the zero-based index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: A megadott nulla alapú indexét határozza meg a IndexOf módszerrel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>objektum.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the node is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Ha a csomópont nem található a gyűjteményben, a módszer&1; értéket ad vissza.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ha a megadott <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum többször szerepel a gyűjteményben, a első előfordulása indexét adja vissza.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> kereséséhez.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of binding within the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: A első előfordulása nulla alapú indexét binding belül a , ha található, ha sikertelen, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: A meghatározott beszúr <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> az objektum a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> objektum a megadott helyen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Insert method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Az Insert metódus használata lehet beszúrni a megadott <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>az objektum a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>objektum `index`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Alternatív megoldásként fűzheti egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum végének a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>használatával a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét helyet, ahol a beszúrandó a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> szúrható be.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektum a megadott indexpozíciónál található a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object located at `i` using array notation.
trans-unit.target: A cikk indexelő eléréséhez használja a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>objektum helyen `i` tömb jelölésével.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: A cikk indexelő lehetővé teszi a módosítására, vagy cserélje le a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum közvetlenül a gyűjteményben.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> beolvasása.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> a megadott indexpozíciónál található a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a megadott <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektum a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Használja a Remove metódust eltávolítja a megadott <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum a gyűjteményből.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Hajtsa végre az adott csomópont elemek majd kerülnek töltse ki az üres pozícióját.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Az indexek, az áthelyezett elemek is frissülnek.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a node at a specific index using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Alternatív megoldásként távolítsa el a megadott index az a csomópont a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Minden csomópont távolítsa el a gyűjtemény használja a <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> eltávolítása.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object at the specified index location from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektum a megadott helyen a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object located at `index` from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: RemoveAt metódus segítségével távolítsa el a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum helyen `index` a egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>objektum.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Hajtsa végre az adott csomópont elemek majd kerülnek töltse ki az üres pozícióját.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Az indexek, az áthelyezett elemek is frissülnek.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Alternatív megoldásként távolítsa el egy adott <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektum használatával a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Is eltávolíthatja minden csomópont a gyűjtemény segítségével a <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét helyét a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> eltávolítása.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.
